newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to trade two new options next week.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to trade two new options next week.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said it would trade options beginning October 30 on the listed stock of Tucson Electric Power Co and the over-the-counter stock of Affinity Technology Group.
Tucson Electric Power will open with strike prices of 17-1/2, 20 and 22-1/2, with contract months of November and December 1996 and February and May 1997. GHM Inc will be specialist.
Affinity Technology Group will open with strike prices of 5, 7-1/2 and 10. Initial months will be November and December 1996 and March and June 1997. Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be specialist.
